# Configure email notification recipients list

Learn how to configure multiple email recipients for deployment notifications in Deployment Manager.

In Deployment Manager, you can configure the email list for notification regarding the deployment status. Previously, an email notification regarding the deployment status was sent to the tenant’s logged-in user once the deployment was complete. For the user, it gives a consolidated view of the deployment status.

Now, you can add more than one email address, and everyone on the list will receive the email notification. By default, the deployment logs are attached to notifications, making it easier for you to understand the status of deployments.

1.  Click Email Notifications button.
2.  In the resulting pop-up screen, enter the recipient’s name and email address .
3.  Click ![Save](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/6b38dd00-9273-49c7-b138-195b9cc11262?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..1TW6b4u0RkJCVz-H5asx7lnYidbw4m4TNLyKkVoFH0U) to save the corresponding recipient.
4.  Click ![Edit](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/75470244-9bbc-48b6-9781-2aa7116f9e42?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..jCo1lYaTzZHPQYIXRCnUR_SKsxX6ulptZf4Lq6JLbko) to edit the recipient’s email address and name. This step is optional.
5.  Click ![Delete email recipients](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/50dd6b6e-772d-4b52-b5ec-60197aa52933?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..UmVkb2OTnS4aIhUclnM-ilJHLXInity0ubBkD2vT6Oo) to delete the recipient’s email address and name. This step is optional.
6.  Click Save .

When you deploy, you will see the Deployment Setup screen; if you choose Yes , the configured email list will be auto-populated. You can also edit or delete the recipients by clicking the Email Notification Settings link.
